tests.name: DS profile review results in content update

input.promptText: fileContent: This is the original content. profile: ds context: Please fix this.

tests.name: FDS profile review results in no changes

input.promptText: fileContent: This content is perfect. profile: fds context: Review this.

depends on: ["some/file.js"]
fileContent: Some code. profile: ds context: No context.

tests.name: Handles multiline content and an empty context string

input.promptText:
fileContent: First line.
Second line. profile: fds context:

tests.expectedOutput:
First line fixed.
Second line fixed.
